alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 1:50AM MST until March 11 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible after daybreak Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
